document_data.name: His Majesty
document_data.mainbody:
'''His Majesty''' was a [[cat]] who claimed the [[Last Light Inn]] as his royal abode during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|Hiss! I say: Hiss!}}
document_data.Personality:
His Majesty was exceptionally haughty, even when compared to cats that claimed no royal heritage. 

He was also quite territorial: the mere presence of others nearby inflicted upon him great personal harm. He would occasionally allow others nearby if only to ''briefly'' admire his beauty and grace.
document_data.Relationships: He did not trust the [[Sel√ªnite]] [[cleric]] [[Isobel Thorm|Isobel]]. For once she promised him a saucer of of [[milk]], and yet there remained no milk before His Majesty.
